Package planning

package planning
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActionSchema
    An action schema defined for a planning problem.
    BackwardStateSpaceSearch
    WARNING: This code currently has several errors and should not be used.
    BackwardStateSpaceSearch.BackPlanState
    A state for backward state-space search.
    BoundAction
     
    ConcreteAction
    A specific action where all of the parameters of the action schema are bound to constants.
    ForwardStateSpaceSearch
    Casts the forward state-space search algorithm for automated planning as an ordinary search problem.
    ForwardStateSpaceSearch.ForwardPlanState
    A custom state class to be used with forward planning The state contains a set of all atoms that are true in the state.
    Literal
    An atomic sentence or its negations.
    PlanningProblem
    A planning problem that has a PDDL-like description.
    StateSpaceSearch
